title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: YES DOOM BOTS 2 IN A ROW!! Who shares my feelings here?

DOOM BOTS OF DOOM WHEW!!!!!!!!!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
I'm excited for the Summoner icons for each milestone of defeating doom bots.
same. I only wish i had mad faker skills to beat the level 100...
Is black market brawlers (aka test all the hilariously stupid/op ideas we come up with) ever coming back?
we want URF
I want doombots of doom actually.
Doombots looks better than getting lulu in urf 5 times in a row without rerolls. Seriously, though. Kinda annoying.
{{champion:427}} Does Ivern even care about the jungle monsters in the Twisted Treeline? Does Vilemaw not like him either, for that matter?

Ivern hates Epic monsters, and Epic Monsters hate him. If he liked Epic monsters, he wouldnt kill them, in hopes they might one day become friends with him. SO he hates them as well.
#EpicMonsterLivesMatter
Will we be able to get Chests and Key frags in doom bots?
Probably not as it's considered Coop against AI.
DOOM BOTS!!
{{item:3902}} TWISTED TREELINE
{{summoner:11}} SMITE TWISTED TREE LINE
Doom Bots was never even that fun...
your opinion is wrong
opinions can't be wrong by definition

You are correct, but questions that really ask opinions aren't as common as people believe.   The question, "What is your favorite color?" is an opinion question because no answer is right or wrong.  The question, "Is Cloud 9 a good team this year?" is not an opinion question because we know they weren't.  See?
*Insert triggered C9 fan gasps here*
So because you like Doom Bots, everyone must like Doom Bots or they're wrong?
I want a game mode where there is 5-10 champions is fighting Free for all in an arena. it will be fun {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Agreed
Devil Teemo and Doombots for Halloween.... I am spook {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
thank god we get more poro king i was getting worried Kappa
How about URF HEXAKILL! If rito is going to spam us with hexakill so much they should at least make it fun.
You gotta be kidding me! Legend of the Poro king is always somewhere on the chart schedule! It is by far one of the worst ones, its aram with a big poro nothing special.

Tbh, I don't care for Legend of the Poro King. Maybe that's because i dont like the ARAM map, but I like the ARURF
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Take that back you fiend!  Legend of the Poro King is a magestic marvelous game!
in my opinion legend of the poro king isn't that fun because its just like aram with a poro king... and yeah i like aram but i would rather have a better gamemode like urf.
I find siege mode to be garbage, sorry but just my opinion
Agreed. It's terribly boring.

Yes! Finally riot brings us Doombots and URF for 2 months, it feels like they're really starting to listen to the community this season. Thanks Rito! But if they really wanted to make us happy, maybe every time there's "hexakill" or "legend or the poro king" in the monthly rotation just replace each with URF or Doombots respectively instead :)

and give graves {{champion:104}} his friggin cigar back so these jokes can stop
more like URF
Why is Riot still putting legend of the poro king and hexakill in the rotating game queue {{item:3070}}
Because there are some people who like it. Doesn't justify them doing it 1-3 times every month, but there are a few people who like it.

Will we have some nice classic normal non random urf after poro? i didn't really enjoy Random urf since i kept getting and also seeing the same champions every game and also i never got to try new champs that i had interest in. and when i do get the chance, someone dodges I:
DOOM BOTS IS COMING!!!
LEGENG OF PORO KING IS CHAOS. For me its the worst gamemode
I hope 2 URF IN A ROW!!

I must not be the only one here that thinks this but... I feel as though **URF** is one of the most popular game mode. At least, in my opinion. It is the only one I enjoy playing non-stop. Please RIOT, if you could possibly keep **URF** as a permanent game mode. I would love you forever. I know this comment will just be left in the dust. But a man can try right? Thank you anyone who reads. {{champion:427}}
They can't have it as a permanent game mode because then they would have to have full support and balancing for it, but it would be nice if we could have every month or two.
I just realized that Doombots starts on Thursday instead, so we get 5 days of glorious doombots

Hexakill TT...













 










I actually kinda like hexakill

I have a question who else has an alpha client
I cant find the rotating gamemode queue on it
The alpha client lacks a lot for the moment... So no there isn't everything, which is why I never use it.
I don't know I kinda enjoy the alpha client despite it missing some things

Lets make a Decakill. 10v10 sounds like it would be a fantatic party. But i am honestly afraid the systems wouldnt handle it. Can the Engine even handle 20 Players on a map? Let alone the servers or the actual client's computers
Hexakill is easily the worst mode {{champion:119}}
